test.name: UI_TS003_Test_1: Check if all buttons visible after clicking on Hide button

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Given The button is visible with the expected color
Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Mouse Out
kw.doc: Simulates moving the mouse away from the element ``locator``.

kw.name: Get CSS Property Value
kw.doc: Get the CSS property value of an Element.

kw.name: Get WebElement
kw.doc: Returns the first WebElement matching the given ``locator``.

kw.name: Call Method
kw.doc: Calls the named method of the given object with the provided arguments.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: And The button is visible with the expected color

kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.
